basics.name: Louan Robert
basics.label: Master's Student in Computer Science with a Focus on Cybersecurity at the University of Liège
basics.summary: Master's student in Computer Science at ULiège with strong technical skills in mathematics, problem solving, computer security & networking. Experienced in APIs and project management, with a passion for innovative technologies. Looking for opportunities to apply expertise in real-world projects.

work.name: BEEGO
work.summary: Provided digital assistance at 'digipoints' for ING and bPost, helping customers with the installation and usage of applications such as Itsme and the ING App.
responsibilities: Assisting customers in navigating and utilizing digital applications
Offering clear and tailored guidance to improve customer digital literacy
Ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction through quality support
Independently managing the operations of the digipoint
achievements: Enhanced understanding of banking processes and applications
Expanded knowledge of digital tools and solutions

volunteer.organization: CSS - ULiège Computer Science Students ASBL (NPO)
volunteer.summary: CSS (Computer Science Students) is the official student association for Computer Science students at the University of Liège. We offer a variety of services, including mentorship programs, a dedicated student lounge, social events, technical training, and outreach activities to promote our field. Our mission is to support and connect students while fostering a vibrant community within the faculty.

highlights: Odoo implementation for financial & management aspects

education.area: Computer Science with a focus on Computer Security

education.institution: Royal Athenaeum of Chênée (Athénée Royal de Chênée)
education.area: Certificate of Higher Secondary Education with a focus on Sciences

projects.name: MDTools
projects.description: A PIM (Product Information Management) system for managing product data and cross-referencing information.
highlights: Built with Spring, Svelte and PostgreSQL.
Implemented user authentication and authorization with Spring Security.
Designed a responsive user interface with Tailwind CSS.
Done as part of a 10 ECTS major university team project. Use of SCRUM methodology with Jira.
